name: LiveDrawingOptions
shortdesc: Live drawing options for when user mouse actions trigger live screen drawing of page items.

property.name: NEVER
property.shortdesc: Never use live screen drawing during mouse operations, use sprite mode.

property.name: IMMEDIATELY
property.shortdesc: Use live screen drawing during mouse operations.

property.name: DELAYED
property.shortdesc: Use live screen drawing during mouse operations after a delay if user pauses before the mouse moves.
